column2: Role:  Senior Build and Design Market Data Engineer  Location:  (Remote) - Bangalore, India Key Essential Skills: Real-time Market Data Distribution and Management FXT, Eikon, MCS, Compliance, Global Relay RRTMDS, Elektron, TREP, Triarch, TIB MDS, RMDS, Gissing Contex Bloomberg, Brokertec, aspen, EBS Reuters dealing, cqg, FactSet Bash/Linux Dacs Design and build engineer  Scripting skills - TCP/IP protocol suite (TCP, UDP, IP Broadcast and Multicast) Local/wide area networks Desirable Skills: Familiar with incident and change management Problem solver  ITIL aware Excellent communication skills, which enables liaison with all levels of a business structure. Experience in resolving difficult problems by using a mix of common sense, patience and diplomacy Overview:  We are currently looking for an experienced Senior Market Data Engineer to join us on a contract basis with an immediate start with our client, a United Kingdom-based stock exchange and financial information company headquartered in the City of London, England. The successful candidate will provide subject matter expertise on TREP and be responsible for the support, configuration, monitoring and maintenance of the platform to ensure the reliable and performant distribution of market data to internal clients. undertake a key role in delivering high impact projects across financial, business intelligence. Role & Responsibilities: Providing technical support for all market data platforms such as TREP and BPIPE Building relationships with infrastructure, commercial market data and application delivery teams Application health checks and monitoring system health Software upgrades and server patching to mitigate vulnerabilities Interface with Partners, Vendors, Operations, Engineering and Finance, and various business and technical stakeholders, ensuring operational standards and governance are developed and maintained. Answer user/application queries regarding market data sourcing and structure Help user/application onboarding to the market data platforms Documentation of market data content Automation opportunities to streamline content search/discovery
column11: scripting, bloomberg, design and build, dacs

column2: Role & responsibilities     Job Description/ Responsibilities: Day to day responsibilities may vary, but a large part of the work will consist of: Managing RFQs (Request for Quotation) and figuring out the optimal price quotes  Understanding business requirements and translating business problems in a way that they can be addressed using data Cross-team coordination to build a proposal considering relevant costs, margin and seasonal fluctuation, chart out operational challenges and solution  for client acquisition  Understanding and interpreting contractual terms to evaluate cost components and benchmark with industrial and company norms Negotiation and Reverse Auction participation for relevant RFQs of Major clients to win meaningful and profitable business Responsible for optimizing Trip Level and account level margins Analyzing and strategizing account level data to identify growth opportunities and actionables to improve profitability Requirements : Proficiency in advanced excel and google spreadsheets A passion for data and business Strong written, oral and visual communication skills B.E./B.Tech with 1+ Yr of experience preferably in Logistics and Supply Chain Industry.
column11: Bidding, RFQS, Online Bidding, Cost Estimation

column2: Freshers can also apply!! Role & responsibilities     A commodity trader is responsible for buying and selling physical commodities, such as metals, energy, and agricultural products. Some job duties of a commodity trader may include: Tracking the market performance at domestic and international scales Buying and selling goods at a price the client agrees on Providing advice to clients about buying, selling or investing Analyzing various reports about the market Developing strategies for investment Interested candidates can share their resume at soniya@topgearconsultants.com
column11: NISM, commodity dealer, Commodities, Fresher, Commodity Trading
